search.query: $source_token$ eth_dst=$filteredMAC$ | fields ip_src, ip_dst, frame_len, src_is_private_ip, eth_src, tls_handshake_type, src_query_name, src_fqdn, traffic_analyzer_stream, _* | table ip_src, ip_dst, frame_len, src_is_private_ip, eth_src, tls_handshake_type, src_query_name, src_fqdn, traffic_analyzer_stream

| where src_is_private_ip="0" | search [ | loadjob $subsearch_id_external$ | where NOT cidrmatch("$custom_ip_range$", ip_src) | dedup eth_src | table eth_src] | where ip_src!="" AND NOT cidrmatch("$custom_ip_range$", ip_src) | fields ip_src, ip_dst, frame_len, src_is_private_ip, eth_src, tls_handshake_type, src_query_name, src_fqdn, traffic_analyzer_stream,_* | table ip_src, ip_dst, frame_len, src_is_private_ip, eth_src, tls_handshake_type, src_query_name, src_fqdn, traffic_analyzer_stream
sourcetype=capture | dedup source | rex field=source "\S*\/(?<shortSource>[^\)].*)" | table shortSource | sort shortSource

| fillnull value="" | dedup ip_src | rename ip_src as ip, src_query_name as "DNS Query", src_fqdn as "Reverse Lookup" | join type=left ip [ | loadjob $subsearch_id_external$ | stats sum(frame_len) as b_out by ip_src | rename ip_src as ip ] | join type=left ip [ | loadjob $subsearch_id_external$ | stats sum(frame_len) as b_in by ip_dst | rename ip_dst as ip ] | join type=left ip [ | loadjob $subsearch_id_external$ | untable traffic_analyzer_stream, type, ip | dedup traffic_analyzer_stream, type | stats count(traffic_analyzer_stream) as "# of connections" by ip | where ip!="" | table ip, "# of connections"] | eval "traffic in" = b_in/1024, "traffic out" = b_out/1024 | table ip, "DNS Query", "Reverse Lookup", "traffic out", "traffic in", "# of connections" | fillnull value=0
